<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> 
    <router-link to="/menu">Menu</router-link>
  </nav>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "Nav",
};
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="scss">
nav {
  padding: 30px;

  a {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #2c3e50;

    &.router-link-exact-active {
      color: #42b983;
    }
  }
}
</style>
